document.full_text: "water walking" -- moving across water or other surfaces while inside a large inflated plastic ball -- poses risks of suffocation and drowning, the consumer product safety commission said on thursday.
document.title: warning to consumers: walking on water is dangerous
lines_and_colors: "water walking" -- moving across water or other surfaces while inside a large inflated plastic ball -- poses risks of suffocation and drowning, the consumer product safety commission said on thursday.
